Headline: Southbound Temporary #54B South Cicero Reroute near Cicero/Cermak
ShortDescription: Southbound 54B South Cicero buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Cicero, Cermak, Kenton and Cermak due to street blockage near Cicero/Cermak.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

Southbound #54B South Cicero buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Cicero, Cermak, Kenton and Cermak due to street blockage near Cicero/Cermak.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Temporary Westbound #96 Lunt Reroute near Lunt/Glenwood
ShortDescription: Westbound 96 Lunt buses are temporarily rerouted near Lunt/Glenwood.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Westbound #96 Lunt buses are temporarily rerouted via Pratt, Ashland, Lunt, and resume normal route, due to street blockage near Lunt/Glenwood.

Eastbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Temporary #8A South Halsted Reroute near Halsted/89th
ShortDescription: 8A South Halsted buses temp. rerouted near Halsted/89th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#8A South Halsted buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions, due to street blockage near Halsted/89th.

Northbound buses will operate via Halsted, 95th. State. 87th, Halsted, and resume normal route.

Southbound buses will operate via Halsted, 87th, Lafayette, 95th, Halsted, and resume normal route.

Allow extra travel time.
